    CaesarCipher
    Caesar cipher class
    CaesarCipherController
    Controller of an Caesar cipher application
    CaesarCipherGUI
    GUI class of caesar cipher application
    CaesarCipherModel
    Class of cipher model contains the data neccessary to encrypt text using caesar cipher

    Class that displays results to the user
    CaesarCipherShiftInputView
    View that asks user for shift input
    CaesarCipherTextInputView
    View that asks user for text input
    EnglishAlphabetValidatorRule
    Validator that checks if input contains characters from english alphabet
    HistoryRecord
    Class stores information about encryption/decryption operation
    ICaesarCipherView
    Interface of an application view
    IValidatorRule
    Interface of a user input validator
    Main
    Main class of a program
    NotEmptyStringValidatorRule
    Validator of empty string
    Validator
    Class of a validator
    ValidatorException
    Validator exception, thrown when validation errors occured
